scene_description_enriched: Four women are depicted in close proximity, engaged in conversation or prayer. They are all wearing head coverings and long robes. The woman on the far left has her hair styled in a bun. The two central women have their hands clasped together, suggesting a moment of shared devotion or supplication. The woman on the far right is also gesturing with her hands. The scene is rendered in a woodcut style, with strong outlines and hatching to indicate shading and form. No architectural elements or specific setting are visible, suggesting a focus on the figures themselves.
